mapper.select: SELECT a.*,c.rfid FROM tb_student a,tb_staff_class b,tb_staff c WHERE b.staff_id=#{id} and c.id=b.staff_id AND a.class_id=b.class_id AND a.deleted =0 AND b.deleted=0 ORDER BY CONVERT( a.name USING gbk )
SELECT a.id,a.class_id,a.name,a.birthday,a.gender FROM tb_student a WHERE a.deleted =0 ORDER BY CONVERT( a.name USING gbk )
SELECT a.id,a.class_id,a.name,a.birthday,a.gender FROM tb_student a WHERE a.id=#{id} AND a.deleted =0 ORDER BY CONVERT( a.name USING gbk )
SELECT class_id FROM tb_staff_class WHERE staff_id = #{id}

select tmp1.id,tmp1.class_id,tmp1.name,tmp1.gender,tmp1.birthday,tmp2.rfid from tb_student tmp1 left join tb_ic_card tmp2 on tmp1.rfid=tmp2.rfid where tmp1.name like #{name} and tmp1.school_id=#{schoolid} and tmp1.deleted=0 ORDER BY CONVERT( NAME USING gbk )

select tmp1.id,tmp1.class_id,tmp1.name,tmp1.gender,tmp1.birthday,tmp2.rfid from tb_student tmp1 left join tb_ic_card tmp2 on tmp1.rfid=tmp2.rfid where tmp1.name like #{name} and tmp1.class_id=#{schoolid} and tmp1.deleted=0 ORDER BY CONVERT( NAME USING gbk )
SELECT * FROM tb_student WHERE school_id=#{id} ORDER BY class_id ORDER BY CONVERT( NAME USING gbk )

select tmp2.relation_id, tmp2.parent_id, tmp1.id, tmp1.School_id as SchoolId, tmp1.class_id, tmp1.title, tmp1.NAME, tmp1.gender, tmp1.birthday, tmp2.relation_title as parent_name, tmp1.ic_number as student_ic_number, tmp2.ic_number as parent_ic_number from (select d.relation_id,d.parent_id,d.relation_title,d.student_id,f.ic_number,e.title from `tb_student_parent` d left join tb_class e on e.id=d.class_id left join tb_ic_card f on f.rfid=d.rfid where d.school_id=#{id} and d.deleted=0 ) tmp2 right join (select a.*,b.title,c.ic_number from tb_student a left join tb_class b on a.class_id = b.id left join tb_ic_card c on c.rfid=a.rfid where a.school_id = #{id} AND a.deleted = 0 ORDER BY CONVERT (a. NAME USING gbk)) tmp1 on tmp1.id=tmp2.student_id left join tb_school_parent tmp3 on tmp2.parent_id=tmp3.id

SELECT tmp1.status,tmp1.in_time,tmp1.out_time,tmp1.id,tmp1.name,tmp1.phone,tmp1.class_id,c.title,tmp1.type,tmp1.school_id ,tmp3.ic_number as rfid FROM (SELECT a.status,a.id,b.class_id,a.type,a.school_id,a.name,a.phone,c.in_time,c.out_time,a.rfid FROM tb_staff a,tb_staff_class b ,tb_sign_type c WHERE a.school_id=#{id} AND a.deleted=0 AND a.type =32 and a.id=b.staff_id and a.sign_type_id=c.id )AS tmp1 LEFT JOIN tb_class c ON tmp1.class_id=c.id left join tb_ic_card tmp3 on tmp1.rfid=tmp3.rfid ORDER BY CONVERT( tmp1.name USING gbk )
select id,title from tb_relation where id=#{id}

SELECT p.id, tmp2.relation_id, tmp2.title AS parent_name, tmp3.ic_number as rfid, p.phone AS parent_phone FROM ( SELECT p.relation_id, tmp1.id, tmp1. NAME, p.relation_title AS title, tmp1.birthday, tmp1.gender, tmp1.class_id, p.parent_id AS parent_id, p.rfid FROM tb_student AS tmp1, tb_student_parent p WHERE tmp1.id = p.student_id AND tmp1.id = #{id} AND p.deleted = 0 AND tmp1.deleted = 0 ) AS tmp2 LEFT JOIN tb_school_parent p ON tmp2.parent_id = p.id left join tb_ic_card tmp3 on tmp2.rfid=tmp3.rfid
SELECT a.* FROM tb_student a WHERE a.class_id=#{id} AND a.deleted =0 ORDER BY CONVERT( a.name USING gbk )

SELECT tmp1.title,tmp1.status,tmp1.school_id,tmp1.id,tmp1.name,tmp1.type,tmp1.phone,tmp1.class_id ,c.in_time,c.out_time ,tmp1.rfid FROM (SELECT c.title,a.status,a.sign_type_id,a.school_id,a.id,a.name,a.phone,a.type,b.class_id,a.rfid FROM tb_staff a,tb_staff_class b ,tb_class c WHERE a.type=32 AND a.id=b.staff_id AND a.deleted=0 AND b.deleted=0 AND b.class_id=c.id ) AS tmp1 LEFT JOIN tb_sign_type c ON (tmp1.sign_type_id =c.id) WHERE class_id=#{id} ORDER BY CONVERT( tmp1.name USING gbk )

select tmp1.title,tmp1.status,tmp1.sign_type_id,tmp1.school_id,tmp1.id,tmp1.name,tmp1.phone,tmp1.type,tmp1.class_id,tmp2.ic_number as rfid from ( SELECT c.title,a.status,a.sign_type_id,a.school_id,a.id,a.name,a.phone,a.type,b.class_id,a.rfid FROM tb_staff a,tb_staff_class b ,tb_class c WHERE a.type=32 AND a.id=b.staff_id AND a.deleted=0 AND b.class_id=c.id AND a.id=#{id} ORDER BY CONVERT( a.name USING gbk ) ) tmp1 left join tb_ic_card tmp2 on tmp1.rfid=tmp2.rfid

select tmp2.ic_number as rfid,tmp1.sign_type_id AS SignTypeId,tmp1.title,tmp1.status,tmp1.school_id,tmp1.id,tmp1.name,tmp1.type,tmp1.phone,tmp1.class_id ,c.in_time,c.out_time FROM (SELECT a.rfid,c.title,a.status,a.sign_type_id,a.school_id,a.id,a.name,a.phone,a.type,b.class_id FROM tb_staff a,tb_staff_class b ,tb_class c WHERE a.type=32 AND a.id=b.staff_id AND a.deleted=0 AND b.deleted=0 AND b.class_id=c.id AND a.name LIKE #{name}) AS tmp1 LEFT JOIN tb_sign_type c ON (tmp1.sign_type_id =c.id) left join tb_ic_card tmp2 on tmp1.rfid=tmp2.rfid WHERE class_id=#{class_id} ORDER BY CONVERT( tmp1.name USING gbk )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_student a SET a.rfid=#{rfid},a.name=#{name},a.class_id=#{class_id},a.gender=#{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT},a.birthday=#{birthday,jdbcType=DATE} where a.id=#{id}
UPDATE tb_student AS a SET a.deleted=1 WHERE a.id=#{id}
UPDATE tb_school_parent a,tb_student_parent b SET a.phone=#{parent_phone}, b.relation_id =#{relation_id},b.relation_title=#{parent_name},b.rfid=#{rfid} where a.id = #{id} and b.parent_id=#{id}

UPDATE TB_STAFF a,tb_staff_class b,tb_staff_signdate c SET a.type = #{type},a.name=#{name},a.phone=#{phone} ,a.deleted=#{deleted},b.class_id=#{class_id}, c.set_intime=#{in_time},c.set_outtime=#{out_time} where a.id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_school_parent a,tb_student_parent b SET a.deleted=1 ,b.deleted = 1 WHERE a.id =#{parent_id} and b.parent_id=#{parent_id} and b.student_id = #{student_id}
